-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | build multiple packages at once
--   
@package cabal-meta
@version 0.4.1.3

module CabalMeta
data Package
Unstable :: UnstablePackage -> Package
Package :: Text -> [Text] -> Package
pLocation :: Package -> Text
pFlags :: Package -> [Text]

-- | An unstable package is one which has not been released to some package
--   repository
data UnstablePackage
Directory :: FilePath -> [Text] -> UnstablePackage
dLocation :: UnstablePackage -> FilePath
upFlags :: UnstablePackage -> [Text]
GitPackage :: Text -> [Text] -> Maybe Text -> UnstablePackage
gitLocation :: UnstablePackage -> Text
upFlags :: UnstablePackage -> [Text]
gTag :: UnstablePackage -> Maybe Text
DarcsPackage :: Text -> [Text] -> Maybe Text -> UnstablePackage
darcsLocation :: UnstablePackage -> Text
upFlags :: UnstablePackage -> [Text]
darcsTag :: UnstablePackage -> Maybe Text
data PackageSources
PackageSources :: [UnstablePackage] -> [Package] -> [UnstablePackage] -> [UnstablePackage] -> [UnstablePackage] -> PackageSources
dirs :: PackageSources -> [UnstablePackage]
hackages :: PackageSources -> [Package]
https :: PackageSources -> [UnstablePackage]
gits :: PackageSources -> [UnstablePackage]
darcsen :: PackageSources -> [UnstablePackage]
readPackages :: Bool -> FilePath -> Sh PackageSources
packageList :: PackageSources -> [[Text]]
vendor_dir :: FilePath
unstablePackages :: PackageSources -> [UnstablePackage]
diskPath :: UnstablePackage -> FilePath
instance Show UnstablePackage
instance Eq UnstablePackage
instance Show Package
instance Eq Package
instance Show PackageSources
instance Eq PackageSources
instance Monoid PackageSources
